step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a relatively still posture during inhalation.  Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you inhale deeply through your nose.
You effectively placed your hands on your abdomen.  Focus on maintaining a comfortable and stable position throughout the exercise.
While the inhalation was adequate, ensure whole-body muscle tightening is consistent throughout the inhalation phase.  Try to engage all muscle groups more actively to improve lymphatic stimulation.
The exhale needs more focus on relaxing the muscles completely and visualizing the fluid being pushed out.  Concentrate on a slow, controlled exhale through your mouth.

exercise_summary: The patient demonstrated good posture and hand placement during the Deep Breathing exercise.  However, consistent whole-body muscle engagement during inhalation and complete muscle relaxation during exhalation need improvement.  Visualizing fluid movement should be emphasized throughout the exercise.
